one.title: Experience the Sandbox
one.p1: We have released a Live Demo of our Sandbox product. Browse through the features below to see what you can expect.
one.p2: The proof of the pudding is, as they say, in the eating.

two.title: Secure Proof of Concepts
two.p1: With Cloudoki Sandbox, secure proof of concepts are as easy to manage as calling an Uber. (We have an app for that.)
two.p2: Talk to one of our humans for more information.

three.title: Sail the Seas of Innovation
three.p1: Cloudoki Sandbox is built on open source technology, just ahead of the curve, in order to give you a long and smooth lifetime cycle.
three.p2: Docker, Kubernetes, Kong, it is all there.

four.title: Extend and Customize
four.p1: The Cloudoki Sandbox is purpose built for customization. Do you need a manual onboarding process? Extend. Send your 2FA sms’es through Twillio? Configure. Support Korean i18n? Customize.

features.title: Sandbox Features
features.desc: Focus on your product. No matter where you are, from ideation to POC design, assign all your resources to the creative process!

one.title: Automated onboarding
one.desc: Let your customers set up an account without delays

two.title: Configured by OpenAPI contracts
two.desc: Swagger definitions is all your sandbox needs

three.title: Unlimited API’s and versions
three.desc: Gracefully test or deprecate without worrying about cost

four.title: Live Sandbox with data storage
four.desc: Build persistent interaction with your users, over multiple API's

five.title: Sandbox silo per account
five.desc: Each customer gets a mini-you. No leaks, no performance impact

one.title: Dockerised on any cloud
one.desc: All you need is Docker. Sandbox is "cloud agnostic"

two.title: Managed test users (Oauth2)
two.desc: Depth of test data and PSU emulation, out of the box

three.title: Two-factor authentication (2FA)
three.desc: Allow a leveled security grade throughout your ecosystem

four.title: Multiple users per account
four.desc: Sandbox enables account RBAC for customer self-service

five.title: 100% Open Source
five.desc: MIT license, no lock-in. Sandbox is simply open source.

otherTreats.title: Other Treats

three.title: Integrated Support
three.desc: Integrate your favourite support service where your user needs it

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: The Cloudoki Sandbox can hold an unlimited amount of API Products and API versions. The former defines the business side of an API, the latter is the technical entry, defined by OpenAPI contracts. This view enables you to automate deprecation control and give better insight in how the API’s and applications are linked together.
